variant.title: Correction to Figure 22, Mehryar Mohri, "Finite-State Transducers in Language and
variant.bodyText: We would like to correct an error in Computational Linguistics 23:2. On page 306 of that issue, in the article by Mehryar Mohri entitled "Finite-State Transducers in Language and Speech Processing," Figure 22 was incorrect, due to a production error. The correct version of Figure 22 appears below. We deeply regret the error.

variant.note: Correction to Figure 22, Mehryar Mohri, "Finite-State Transducers in Language and Speech Processing"
variant.abstract: would like to correct an error in Linguistics On page 306 of that issue, in the article by Mehryar Mohri entitled "Finite-State Transducers in Language and Speech Processing," Figure 22 was incorrect, due to a production error. The correct version of Figure 22 appears below. We deeply regret the error.
variant.note: a/1 Figure 22 Subsequential power series X nonbisubsequential. C) 1997 Association for Computational Linguistics
